Author: staunch
Content: I've written lots of reporting systems. I always keep things abstracted enough that supporting new visualization methods is painless. I'll be adding support for the iPhone as a simple plugin.

Author: staunch
Content: Sometimes CEOs give boring presentations on revolutionary products. More often they give boring presentations on boring products. Steve Jobs has a huge advantage when it comes time to show his work because he produces such earth-shattering stuff. His salesmanship is the the icing on the already-delicious cake.
